name: Etti
case: Eastside Board Games Shop Missing Person Case
info: Etti's normal attack has a 10% probability of forming a [Celestial Body] to attack the enemies.
maniaIntensifyText: The probability of triggering Etti's initial attribute is increased by 5%
criminalRecord:
The subject was the owner of a mysterious board game shop in Eastside well-known among local board game lovers. The shop did brisk business, but was related to multiple missing customer cases.

When she was confronted by Chief during the board game incident, the subject revealed the disastrous potential of her ability. It confirmed the suspicion of her confinement of multiple customers and immediate detention was thus required.

--

Currently, under the MBCC's strict supervision, the subject consciously controls her power when organizing board game activities so as to ensure others' safety. As she spends more time with other Sinners and Chief, the subject has become less obsessed with rules and control and her excessive urge to escape reality has been curbed. She's become more trusting and approving towards real life, herself, and the people around her.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
With her ability, she can reshape the atomic structure of any substance to turn it into an object she wants. The effective time of her ability is controlled by her own will and mental power. The subject's attacks are usually the product of her imagination.

+++* Awakening Signs
Investigation reveals that the subject was directly exposed to BR-004's contaminants and was subsequently subject to long-term malicious mental influence by others. The two events awakened her ability.

+++* Corruption State
She suffers from a moderate level of corruption. Her body shows no apparent signs of mutation, but her mental state is unstable. Mood swings are particularly common when she organizes board games.
ecbFlavourText:
"I'll create my own fantasy world!"
"It will be the best world ever, the greatest adventure ever!"
interrogation1:
After escaping from the game in Aesthia, the Chief and Arrest Team track Etti down to her house. They find her sleeping, and take her into custody. She remains asleep for three days, recovering from the amount of energy expenditure necessary to create an entire fictional world. When she comes to, she is defiant and combative. However, the Chief is able to get her interest by engaging her in a roleplaying game. They give Etti a character sheet to fill out and begin a LARP adventure through the Bureau.

As expected, Etti quickly accepts the invitation to the// game. //She fills out the character card and challenges you with a smile. She thinks you can never control her.
interrogation2:
The Chief and Etti‚Äôs LARP adventure bring them to the Bureau‚Äôs Outdoor Activity Area, where the Chief narrates that she is in a wasteland environment and must find resources to survive and make it to the next town. She encounters [[[Hella]]] and [[[Nintety-Nine]]], whom the Chief had previously recruited to be part of the game. The two of them have a bag of bread, which Etti will need to make it through the wasteland. She attacks them unprovoked, and Ninety-Nine awkwardly plays along as she pretends to be defeated. Hella fights back, but is easily dispatched. The Chief bends the rules to narrate the bread being knocked out of reach during the fight, and Ninety-Nine obediently throws it on top of the Bureau‚Äôs fence. At the Chief‚Äôs urging, Etti decides that the three of them will need to work together in order to survive the wilderness without food, and recruits Hella and Ninety-Nine to her party. She orders Ninety-Nine to destroy the fence in order to retrieve the bread, and the three escape from the Bureau together. Following behind the LARP, [[[Nightingale]]] and [[[KK | K.K.]]] look in despair at the extent of the destruction the game is causing on the MBCC‚Äôs facilities.

Guided by// fate, //Etti, Hella, and Ninety-Nine form an adventurer team. After wrecking the Bureau's walls, they quickly escape...
interrogation3:
The adventure brings them to a district on the border of [[[Eastside]]] and [[[Syndicate]]], where the Chief narrates that there is a bazaar where they can gather clues. Exploring the area, Etti and the others meet [[[EMP]]], who offers them information about the legendary castle that they‚Äôre seeking. However, Etti presumes that EMP is trying to swindle them and again launches an unprovoked attack. EMP dodges Ninety-Nine‚Äôs attack and strikes back, but Etti and Hella‚Äôs quick-thinking teamwork allow them to defeat her. Despite being beaten, EMP clarifies that she does actually have a clue about the castle, and requests to join the adventuring party.

The adventurer team defeats the// West District Overlord //EMP and takes her in. With the message from EMP, Etti confirms that the instructions for the next step are kept by the merchant who sells her clues.
interrogation4:
The Chief leads them to an art gallery which is supposed to contain the information broker where EMP received her clue, but they receive a message that [[[McQueen]]] got bored of waiting and left early. Improvising, the Chief has them search the premises and they uncover a clue revealing the location of the legendary castle. Etti excitedly leads the party towards the final stop of their adventure. The ‚Äúcastle‚Äù is a dark house in a remote part of Eastside. There, they fight the ‚ÄúDreadlord‚Äù, played by [[[list of minor characters |Wynn]]]. By working together, they defeat Wynn, and [[[Nightingale]]] reveals herself as the true final boss. She asks Etti to join her. To everyone‚Äôs shock, Etti agrees, and begins to control the darkness that envelops the house as it overtakes her party members. She and the Chief face off as Etti‚Äôs [[[spiritual energy |spiritual realm]]] begins to manifest again, and they make a contested role of their dice to determine the winner. Etti rolls the better result and her power overwhelms the Chief‚Ä¶ until they wake up unharmed, back in the house in the real world. Etti reveals that she was pranking them as payback for the Chief‚Äôs shoddy game-mastering and showing them how it should really be done. The Chief congratulates Etti for clearing the game, and rewards her with a real treasure that they had found when searching her grandfather‚Äôs house after she was arrested: a letter from him, passing along his hopes that even after he was gone, she could continue to have fun with the games that the two of them had played together.

The dragon guards the magic box, in which darkness, tears, despair... and a small but brilliant glint of hope are locked. Within the hope is everything everyone cherishes and will never forget.
arrestRec1: During the board game incident, Chief won Etti's game and successfully tore down her illusory realm. After the events, the subject was taken back to the MBCC by Chief where she was put under investigation and detention.
arrestRec2: The subject's birth was an accident and her parents had no intention to raise her. She was left at her grandfather's door at birth. Growing up, she and her grandfather took care of each other. She had almost never met her irresponsible parents.
arrestRec3: The lack of parental care and other external factors had made the subject extremely unsociable and lonely, so she began to immerse herself books and games. To guide her out of her trauma, her grandfather studied her hobby and turned their home into various game scenes with decorations to cheer her up.
arrestRec4: The subject has a very deep bond with her grandfather. She treasures and is very protective of their old house and memories about him. This is why she turned her home into the //game space// after awakening as a Sinner. Before he passed away, her grandfather left her an unfinished rulebook which carries his hope that his grandfather could move on from darkness and sadness.
servingTerm1: Outgoing and witty, the subject has quickly gotten along with everyone in the Bureau and adjusts well to life under detention. But her extremely whimsical and active mind also makes it hard for many to match her tempo during conversations.
servingTerm2: Ever since the subject came, the Sinners in the Bureau have gained a new form of entertainment, TRPG game. The games held by Etti are so dramatic and thrilling that they have become hugely popular in the MBCC. To join the game, reservations usually have to be made a month earlier.
servingTerm3: Not only is the subject a master in board games, but she's also an expert in various video games. Because she broke the records of many games on the communal game console in the Recreation Area a week after she arrived, Sinner EMP sees her as her archenemy.
servingTerm4: The subject wants to design a brand new board game set in the MBCC, but her frequent unauthorized research visits to different sections of the Bureau have greatly troubled Chief and staff of various departments.
emotionCheck1:
[Before you go out, Etti blocks your way and puts her hand on your shoulder.]

**Etti:** The chosen hero, you've passed my trials. Now, you're to set out on your journey with the sword pulled from the stone. Are you ready?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** I'm ready.
 * **Etti:** Very well, I'll meet you at the destination of the journey and crown you with glory and treasure.
 * **Etti:** üòâ

* **Prompt:** Not ready...
 * **Etti:** Tsk, can't you just play along with me for once?
 * **Etti:** üòñ
emotionCheck2:
[Etti is reading a picture book with amusement. On the cover is a huge dragon breathing fire.]

**Etti:** Good timing. Which dragon do you think looks like me?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** The red one?
 * **Etti:** Its name is Soarblaze and its expertise is fire magic. It guards the mysterious treasure. Legends about it are told everywhere... Cool!
 * **Etti:** üòò

* **Prompt:** The white one?
 * **Etti:** The Mystaran Crystalline Dragon's scales are like ice crystals that reflect sunlight into brilliant colors... Hmm, indeed, it looks better.
 * **Etti:** üòè
supervision1:
++* ‚ö† Do Dragons Have Wings?

//Etti and [[[OwO]]] seem to disagree on something.//

**System Notifications:** Etti and OwO seem to disagree on the topic of whether dragons have wings.

* **Prompt:** It could be a different breed‚Ä¶
supervision2:
++* ‚ö† Handmade Book

//Etti is decorating her room.//

**System Notifications:** After settling down in the MBCC, Etti immediately decorated her room in a fantasy style and displayed her grandfather's handmade book in the most eye-catching spot.

* **Prompt:** Observe

**System Notifications:** The handmade book is clearly old, but it's very well kept.
supervision3:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† Gate to Otherworld

//The Supervision System detects unusual behaviors in Sinner Etti.//

**System Notifications:** Supervision System: Unusual behaviors have been detected in Sinner Etti. Go and inspect?

* **Prompt:** Yes

**System Notifications:** You follow the Supervision System's instructions and come to the corner of the Outdoor Activity Area. Etti is standing still next to the wall.

* **Prompt:** Come up and ask

**Chief:** Etti, what are you doing?

**Etti:** Shh!

**System Notifications:** Etti pulls you closer and shushes you. She lowers her voice and says mysteriously.

**Etti:** I've found the gate to Otherworld!

**Chief:** Hmm...

**Etti:** Have you noticed? In this inconspicuous corner, there's actually a hidden gate!

**Etti:** Sometimes you can hear mysterious sounds inside. You can even see colorful lights shining through this crack.

**Etti:** There must be another world on the other side of this gate!

**Chief:** Hmm...

**Etti:** What do you think? It makes so much sense, doesn't it?

**Chief:** Have you considered the possibility that this is just the door of a regular equipment room?

**Chief:** The sounds you hear and the lights you see come from the machines running in the room.

**Etti:** ...
supervision4:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† Weapon Design

//Etti has no scheduled training missions today, but she still shows up in the Training Room.//

**System Notifications:** Etti has no scheduled training missions today, but she still shows up in the Training Room. You find it a bit odd, so you go and ask her why.

**Chief:** You don't have any training missions today. Why are you here?

**Etti:** I'm designing a new board game and I'm still missing a few weapons. So I've come to look for inspiration.

**Etti:** Hehe, Chief, it's not against the rules to watch others train, is it?

**Chief:** ...No. But try not to disturb them.

**Etti:** No worries, I'll just watch on the side.

**System Notifications:** She moves through the Training Room packed with Sinners and keeps talking to herself as she walks.

* **Prompt:** Follow and listen to what she's saying

**Etti:** Wow, what a huge hammer! //Huge Hammer// it is! Sounds exactly like what it is!

**Etti:** //Rusty Chainsaw.// Nice. It's mysterious and dramatic.

**Etti:** Hmm... Double swords are indeed cool. Let's call them //Meat Choppers//...

**Etti:** ...

**Chief:** Your naming system seems a bit arbitrary...
supervision5:
++* ‚ö†‚ö†‚ö† Career Flop

//Etti organizes her first TRPG game in the Bureau today. Everyone's excited about it.//

**System Notifications:** Etti organizes her first TRPG game in the Bureau today. Everyone gathers around the long table. It's the first time many of the participants have played this kind of game. After a brief introduction to the rules by Etti, the game begins.

* **Prompt:** Watch

**Etti:** Once you form your team, you set off on your journey... The Gatekeeper is blocking your way. What do you do?

**Bai Yi:** I'll seduce him!

**Etti:** ...You encounter a monster. It's very strong and powerful.

**Bai Yi:** Stay back, let me seduce it!

**Etti:** There's a wall in front of you...

**Bai Yi:** Seduce it! Seduce it!

**Etti:** ...

**Etti:** I must remind you that the success rate is extremely low this time. Are you sure you wanna do it?

**Roulecca:** Yes!

**Etti:** The result is... success...

**Roulecca:** Sigh, we've had nothing but critical successes, how boring...

**Etti:** ...

**Etti:** The treasure chest can only be opened with a special key...

**Hella:** Listen to me! We'll smash it open!

**Etti:** This time, you'll need to analyze the situation and come up with a solution...

**Hella:** Smash it! Smash it! ******* smash it!

**Etti:** ...

**Etti:** My heroes, you've overcome all the hardships and now face the Archdemon, that is, myself. I transform into a huge dragon and launch my ultimate at you who do not obey the rules.

**Etti:** All of you die. There's no chance of striking back. I'm sorry for the result and I look forward to meeting you again in the next round.

**System Notifications:** After she announces that, the crowd begins clamoring.

**Sinner A:** Why?!

**Sinner B:** You're the Archdemon? And you can just kill everyone with your ultimate? Why didn't you say so when you explained the rules?

**Etti:** You guys didn't respect my rules. That's your punishment.

* **Prompt:** Maintain order

**System Notifications:** The crowd is on the brink of a heated argument, so you immediately intervene and dismiss the players and the onlookers. After the group has dispersed, Etti is still in her seat, crossing her arms.

* **Prompt:** Comfort her
 * **Etti:** I've seen people try to go around the rules, but not completely ignore the rules like that.
 * **Chief:** There, there. Don't be mad. You defeated all of them with one blow in the end, didn't you?
 * **Chief:** And there's always room for adjustment for rules. Will you consider adapting the rules of your game to suit the Sinners here?

* **Prompt:** Give your suggestion
 * **Chief:** Perhaps you could consider modifying the rules slightly to suit the players here? After all, they're no ordinary players.
 * **Chief:** A game is only meaningful when everyone can have fun.
 * **Etti:** You're right. I'll come up with the perfect rules so even these extraordinary players can enjoy it!
supervision6:
++* ‚ö†‚ö†‚ö† Escape from Minos

//The nighttime Supervision System detects unauthorized gatherings in the tool room that seem to be conspiring about an escape from the Bureau.//

**System Notifications:** Supervision System:
Unauthorized gatherings have been detected in the tool room. Participants seem to be conspiring about an escape from the Bureau. Please confirm.

* **Prompt:** Confirm

**System Notifications:** Restoring image...

**System Notifications:** Supervision System:
Image comparison shows that the instigator bears 99.8% resemblance to Sinner Etti. Go and inspect?

* **Prompt:** Yes

**System Notifications:** Following the Supervision System's instructions, you come to the small tool room next to the greenhouse. You indeed hear Etti's voice coming from there.

**Etti:** Amid the chaos, you manage to sneak into the emergency exit without triggering the alarm.

**Etti:** You feel lucky and keep running up the stairs, but then see a fully armed security guard around the corner.

**Etti:** What do you do now?

**Sinner A:** Run... Run over and beat him up!

* **Prompt:** Open the door and enter

**Chief:** What are you guys doing here?

**Etti:** Ah, Chief... I'm holding a game.

**Chief:** Holding a game?

**Etti:** Yes. It's a game I've designed after settling down here. It's called Escape from Minos.

**Etti:** It's very fun. I'll count you in next time!

**Chief:** I'm not forbidding you to play, but it's not recreation time now. If you stay here, you may disturb others' work and the operation of the facilities.

**Chief:** Moreover, you didn't request permission from me beforehand, so this is technically an unauthorized gathering.

**Etti:** But playing after midnight makes it more atmospheric... Hold on, you said I didn't request permission...

**Etti:** If I do request it, will you approve it?

* **Prompt:** I'll think about it.
 * **Chief:** This tool room is not a suitable venue... but rules can be adapted sometimes.
 * **Chief:** If you really want to play it at night, I can see if I can arrange another suitable venue for you.

* **Prompt:** It'll depend on your performance.
 * **Chief:** If your recent performance is satisfactory, I'll consider making an exception.
 * **Etti:** Cool! You must keep your word!
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
The mission has been judged as a success! Hero, time to celebrate. You can take me away now.

[Raise to Phase 1]
Aha, that's more like it! This is what the "Game Master" deserves!

[Raise to Phase 3]
From now on, I shall dictate the rules of the game!

[Level Start]
The game has begun! Come pick out a way to change your fate!

[Win Battles]
Congratulations on clearing the level! Heroes, go claim your bounty!

[Lose Battles]
Ouch... it hurts... I knew that team would be hard to lead...

[Ultimate Skill]
Obey my rules!

[Die in Battles]
Everything has been... shattered...

[Greeting]
The forces of darkness are about to descend upon the world... Hero, it's time to embark on your journey!

[Conversation 1]
Have no fear! Tell me what you want to do next.

[Conversation 2]
Everything "interesting" in this world comes from "imagination", so you don't need to restrain yourself in front of me. Do you understand?

[Conversation 3]
Not everyone can complete my games... But you look like someone with potential. Want to try it out?

[Special Conversation 1]
"Good," "neutral," and "evil"... Which one do you think I am? Or rather, which one do you want me to be?

[Special Conversation 2]
They all say that dragons are selfish and greedy, but I think... It's just because no one dares to become close with them...

[Special Conversation 3]
As long as you hold a dragon-slaying gun in your hand, it's a symbol of justice, even if the gun is broken. So... what are you going to do to an evil dragon like me?

[Full Compliance]
I'm addicted to dark and thrilling imagination, yet I fear the the frosty loneliness there... Thank you for defeating me... Thank you, for being by my side.

[Idle]
Sometimes, the "world" wants to take a break, too... Let's get some rest.

[Annoyed]
You acted without approval... This world will punish you.

[Special Attention]
Are the treasures you seek in my eyes?

[Dispatch]
Time for our spring trip!

[Dispatch Complete]
I got a lot of items! Want to see what they are? As long as I'm here, nothing bad will happen.

[Level Up]
It's only fun when you have trade-offs for your base attributes.

[Pat Head]
You like my horn, too? Let me tell you about it! It was during a harsh, cold winter... Hey! Where are you going?
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
As night falls, ghostly lanterns flicker to life. The ancient castle of the dragon will reopen its dusty grates, beckoning the chosen warriors with its secrets and treasures... Hehe, how's that? Immersive enough?

[Greeting]
The clock has struck midnight. No time to dawdle! Embark on a brand new adventure alongside the dark demon from the Land of Oblivion! Uh-huh, that means me, your guide!

[Ordinary Contact 1]
These pumpkins are too cute? Umm, maybe they do look a little... Hold on! The game we're playing today is horror themed! They are obviously appalling! How can they be cute!

[Ordinary Contact 2]
Hmm? Candy? D-don't think you can buy me off with a measly two pieces of candy! I'm a demon, and demons are meant to cause trouble! You know that, right?

[Idle] 
Dear traveler, please don't let your guard down. The rocky path is full of temptations and traps, and the red-winged demon will eventually reveal her dragon's claws and teeth.

[Annoyed]
Ahh! Don't pull my tail! Acting without permission is not allowed! Not even to your guide! ...What kind of punishment you'll face, you ask? Hmph, take... a... guess?

[Special Attention] 
What are you looking at me for? Hurry up! Huh? You're not really scared, are you? Relax, if you're in any danger, I'll make an exception and provide you with a little extra help... but don't tell anyone about this!

[Level Up}
Gaze from the Devil takes effect, Luck +1!
nightmareTalent: Each time a [Resource Chest] on the map is obtained, there's a 1% chance of getting 1000 [Illusory Moon Coins].

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Dragon and Creator
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: Once [Celestial Bodies] deal damage to an enemy, all [Celestial Bodies] deal 12%/16%/20% more damage to that enemy for 15 seconds. Can be stacked up to 4 times.

upgrade.description: All [Celestial Bodies] deal $0% more damage to that enemy.

exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText:
"I'll create my own fantasy world!"
"It will be the best world ever, the greatest adventure ever!"

maniaIntensify.title: Genesis Blueprint
maniaIntensify.text: The probability of triggering Etti's initial attribute is increases by 5%.

crimebrandSets.name: Boss Burst
crimebrandSets.note: Deal a lot of damage to an enemy when it is corebroken.

crimebrandSets.name: Short Battle Burst
crimebrandSets.note: Great for early damage, but ensure that you are able to end the battle within 30 seconds.

crimebrandSets.name: Alternative
crimebrandSets.note: Can be used to increase her ult damage by a lot, but sacrifices her Normal Attack damage.

shackles.title: Guaranteed Round
shackles.description: The number of [Celestial Bodies] in [Game Master] increases by 3.

shackles.title: Looming Dragon
shackles.description: The probability of triggering Etti's initial attribute is increased by 10%.

shackles.title: Final Treasure
shackles.description: At the start of the battle, Etti immediately generates the 3 [Gems] of [Game Rules].

skills.name: Throw
skills.description: Etti gathers energy with her staff to attack, dealing (Attack*80.6%) Magic Damage each time.

skills.name: Game Master

upgrade.description: The number of [Celestial Bodies] increases to $0 and damage increases to $0%.

skills.description: Etti creates a [Constellation] in the target area and forms 6 [Celestial Bodies] to continuously attack random enemies within range. Each [Celestial Body] deals (Attack*120%) Magic Damage.

skills.name: Accelerate Operation
skills.description: Whenever Etti's initial attribute is triggered, her Attack Speed increases by 20% for 10 seconds. Etti can cast one extra [Celestial Body] (up to 4) next time using [Game Master]. The effect will be removed after Etti casts [Game Master] once.

skills.name: Game Rules
skills.description:
Throughout the battle, each enemy has a 5% probability of generating a [Gem] after they die. A Sinner can gain a buff for 12 seconds after stopping for a moment to pick up the [Gem]. The same [Gem] effects can not be stacked.
Red Gem: Attack Speed increases by 15%.
Green Gem: Damage reduces by 10%.
Blue Gem: Magic Damage increases by 15%.

upgrade.description: Attack Speed bonus increases to $0%. Damage reduction increases to $0%. Damage bonus increases to $0%.

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Attack +6
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Attack +7, Unlock Mission: Dispatch Etti 2 times
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlock Mission: Replace Demon - Upgrade to Outdoor Supervision Object
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Unlock Sticker
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Unlock Voice: Full Compliance, Unlock Sinner Title: The Creator's Rules

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: As night falls, ghostly lanterns flicker to life. The ancient castle of the dragon will reopen its dusty gates, beckoning the chosen warriors with its secrets and treasures... Hehe, how's that? Immersive enough?
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: Ïñ¥Îë†Ïù¥ ÎÇ¥Î¶¨Í≥†, Ìù¨ÎØ∏Ìïú Îì±Î∂àÏù¥ Î∞ùÏïÑÏò§ÎÑ§Ïöî. ÎπÑÎ∞ÄÍ≥º Î≥¥Î¨ºÏùÑ ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏÑ†Î∞úÎêú ÎëêÎ†§ÏõÄÏùÑ Î™®Î•¥Îäî Ïö©ÏÇ¨Îì§Ïù¥Ïó¨! Ïò§Îû´ÎèôÏïà Íµ≥Í≤å Îã´ÌòÄÏûàÎçò ÎìúÎûòÍ≥§ Í≥†ÏÑ±Ïùò Î¨∏Ïù¥ Ïó¥Î†∏ÏäµÎãàÎã§‚Ä¶ Ìó§Ìó§, Ïñ¥Îïå? Ïù¥Ï†ú Ï¢Ä Î™∞ÏûÖÏù¥ Îèº?
voicelines.Greeting - EN: The clock has struck midnight. No time to dawdle! Embark on a brand new adventure alongside the dark demon from the Land of Oblivion! Uh-huh, that means me, your guide!

voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: These pumpkins are too cute? Umm, maybe they do look a little... Hold on! The game we're playing today is horror themed! They are obviously appalling! How can they be cute!
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: ‚Ä¶Ïù¥ Ìò∏Î∞ïÎì§Ïù¥ ÎÑàÎ¨¥ Í∑ÄÏóΩÎã§Í≥†? Ïúº‚Ä¶ ÎÑ§ ÎßêÏùÑ Îì§Ïñ¥Î≥¥Îãà Îòê Í∑∏Î†áÍ∏¥ ÌïúÎç∞‚Ä¶ ÏïÑÎãàÏïº, ÏïÑÎÉê! Ïö∞Î¶¨Í∞Ä Ïò§Îäò Ìï† Í≤åÏûÑÏùÄ Í≥µÌè¨ Ïû•Î•¥Ïïº! Ïù¥ Ìò∏Î∞ïÎì§ÏùÄ ÏôÑÏ†Ñ ÎÅîÏ∞çÌïòÎã§Í≥†! Ïñ¥ÎñªÍ≤å Í∑ÄÏó¨Ïö∏ ÏàòÍ∞Ä ÏûàÍ≤†Ïñ¥?

voicelines.Idle - EN: Dear traveler, please don't let your guard down. The rocky path is full of temptations and traps, and the red-winged demon will eventually reveal her dragon's claws and teeth.
voicelines.Idle - KR: ÏπúÏï†ÌïòÎäî Î™®ÌóòÍ∞ÄÎãò, Í≤ΩÍ≥ÑÎ•º Îä¶Ï∂îÏßÄ ÎßàÏÑ∏Ïöî. ÏûêÍ∞àÍ∏∏ÏóêÎäî Ïú†ÌòπÍ≥º Ìï®Ï†ïÏù¥ Í∞ÄÎìùÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Îπ®Í∞Ñ ÎÇ†Í∞úÏùò ÏïÖÎßàÎèÑ Í≤∞Íµ≠ ÎìúÎûòÍ≥§Ïùò Î∞úÌÜ±ÏùÑ ÎìúÎü¨ÎÇº Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§~
